General.Name: Emmi AG
General.Description: Emmi AG, together with its subsidiaries, develops, produces, and markets a range of dairy and fresh products primarily in Switzerland, North and South America, Africa, Asia/Pacific, and the rest of Europe. The company operates through Dairy Products, Cheese, Fresh Products, Fresh Cheese, Powder/Concentrates, and Other Products/Services segments. It offers milk, cream, butter, cheese, desserts, ice cream, yogurt. The company also exports its products to approximately 60 countries. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Lucerne, Switzerland. Emmi AG is a subsidiary of ZMP Invest AG.
